author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-Hon Hai's March Sales Up 2.2 Percent Y/Y At T$349 Billion
text:
(Refiles to fix link)
April 10 (Reuters) - Hon Hai Precision Industry Co Ltd :
* SAYS MARCH SALES UP 2.2 PERCENT Y/Y AT T$349.15 BILLION ($11.96 billion) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2JzScRt (Please cut and past the link on to a browser to read the release) Further company coverage: ($1 = 29.1990 Taiwan dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
